mapper.select: SELECT menu.id AS menu_id, menu.name AS menu_name, menu.show AS menu_show, menu.path AS menu_path, menu.path_name AS menu_path_name, menu.parent_id AS menu_parent_id, button.id AS button_id, button.name AS button_name, button.code AS button_code, button.api_id AS button_api_id, api.id AS api_id, api.name AS api_name, api.path AS api_path, CASE WHEN role_menu.role_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as menu_checked, CASE WHEN role_button.role_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as button_checked FROM "menu" LEFT JOIN button ON menu.id = button.menu_id LEFT JOIN api ON button.api_id = api.id LEFT JOIN role_menu ON menu.id = role_menu.menu_id AND role_menu.role_id = #{id} LEFT JOIN role_button ON button.id = role_button.button_id AND role_button.role_id = #{id}
